body_html:
When I run:

input = Variable(torch.randn(30, 3, 10)).cuda()

I have exactly the same issue:
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/home/****/****/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c line=66 error=30 : unknown error

  • My system is Ubuntu 16.04.
  • I have cuda 8.0 and Cudnn 5.0 (everything works perfectly with Theano or tensorflow)
  • I did two installation: pip and in a virtual env with source installation for python 2.7.

Here the output of nvidia-smi:

  • NVIDIA-SMI 375.26
  • Driver version 375.26
  • One GPU GeForce GTX 850M (4043 MiB)

The strange thing is everything worked well when I used cuda 7.5.

```python
input = Variable(torch.randn(30, 3, 10)).cuda()
```
I have exactly the same issue:
`THCudaCheck FAIL file=/home/****/****/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c line=66 error=30 : unknown error`

+ My system is Ubuntu 16.04.
+ I have cuda 8.0 and Cudnn 5.0 (everything works perfectly with Theano or tensorflow)
+ I did two installation: pip and in a virtual env with source installation for python 2.7.

Here the output of nvidia-smi:
+ NVIDIA-SMI 375.26
+ Driver version 375.26
+ One GPU GeForce GTX 850M (4043 MiB)

The strange thing is everything worked well when I used cuda 7.5.
